Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Heritage the Villas in Bel Ombre, you'll be next to a golf course and close to Heritage Golf Club and Frederica Nature Reserve. This 5-star villa is within the vicinity of Riambel Beach and Chamarel Falls.

Rooms
Treat yourself to a stay in one of the individually decorated guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and private pools. Your memory foam bed comes with down comforters. Rooms have private balconies. Kitchens are outfitted with full-sized refrigerators/freezers, stovetops, and microwaves. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 40-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as outdoor tennis courts, a health club, and an outdoor pool. Additional features at this Art Deco villa include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the villa's restaurant, which features a bar and a garden view. You can also stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a poolside bar, or a swim-up bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Bel Ombre? This villa has 1000 square feet (93 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the villa's restaurant, which features a bar and a garden view. You can also stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a poolside bar, or a swim-up bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Heritage the Villas in Bel Ombre, you'll be next to a golf course and close to Heritage Golf Club and Frederica Nature Reserve. This 5-star villa is within the vicinity of Riambel Beach and Chamarel Falls.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Heritage Golf Club - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Frederica Nature Reserve - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Riambel Beach - 6.5 km / 4.1 mi
Chamarel Falls - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Seven Coloured Earths - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Rhumerie de Chamarel - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Black River Gorges National Park - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Alexandra Falls Hiking Trail - 10 km / 6.2 mi
Rochester Falls - 10.6 km / 6.6 mi
Le Morne Mountain - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
Le Morne Beach - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
Gris Gris Beach - 12.1 km / 7.5 mi
Macchabee Forest Hiking Trail - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Le Petrin Information Center - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Ganga Talao - 12.9 km / 8 mi

The preferred airport for Heritage the Villas is Mahebourg (MRU-Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam Intl.) - 28.5 km / 17.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
